verses.verse: And it came to pass in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to enquire <S%H1875><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Are ye come <S%H935><s%> to enquire <S%H1875><s%> of me? As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, I will not be enquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you.

Wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them? cause them to know <S%H3045><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>: Wilt: or, Wilt thou plead for them

And say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, when I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%>, I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; lifted: or, sware

In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them, to bring them forth <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> that I had espied <S%H8446><s%> for them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands <S%H776><s%>:

Then said <S%H559><s%> I unto them, Cast ye away <S%H7993><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and defile <S%H2930><s%> not yourselves with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me, and would <S%H14><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me: they did not every man <S%H376><s%> cast away <S%H7993><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, neither did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: then I said <S%H559><s%>, I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, among <S%H8432><s%> whom they were, in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto them, in bringing them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
Wherefore I caused them to go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and shewed <S%H3045><s%> them my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them. shewed: Heb. made them to know

Moreover also I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, to be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and them, that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: they walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them; and my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> they greatly <S%H3966><s%> polluted <S%H2490><s%>: then I said <S%H559><s%>, I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to consume <S%H3615><s%> them.

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them out <S%H3318><s%>.

Yet also I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that I would not bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I had given <S%H5414><s%> them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands <S%H776><s%>;

Because they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, but polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>: for their heart <S%H3820><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%>.
Nevertheless mine eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> them from destroying <S%H7843><s%> them, neither did I make <S%H6213><s%> an end <S%H3617><s%> of them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

But I said <S%H559><s%> unto their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, Walk <S%H3212><s%> ye not in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, neither observe <S%H8104><s%> their judgments <S%H4941><s%>, nor defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with their idols <S%H1544><s%>:
I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them;
And hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>; and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and you, that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

Notwithstanding the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me: they walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, neither kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, which if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them; they polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>: then I said <S%H559><s%>, I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

Nevertheless I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%>.

I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them also in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries <S%H776><s%>;

Because they had not executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, but had despised <S%H3988><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and had polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were after <S%H310><s%> their fathers' <S%H1><s%> idols <S%H1544><s%>.
Wherefore I gave <S%H5414><s%> them also statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not good <S%H2896><s%>, and judgments <S%H4941><s%> whereby they should not live <S%H2421><s%>;

And I polluted <S%H2930><s%> them in their own gifts <S%H4979><s%>, in that they caused to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire all that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7356><s%>, that I might make them desolate <S%H8074><s%>, to the end that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Yet in this your fathers <S%H1><s%> have blasphemed <S%H1442><s%> me, in that they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against me. committed: Heb. trespassed a trespass

For when I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%>, for the which I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to them, then they saw <S%H7200><s%> every high <S%H7311><s%> hill <S%H1389><s%>, and all the thick <S%H5687><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and there they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering <S%H7133><s%>: there also they made <S%H7760><s%> their sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, and poured out <S%H5258><s%> there their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%>.

Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto them, What is the high place <S%H1116><s%> whereunto ye go <S%H935><s%>? And the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>. I said: or, I told them what the high place was, or, Bamah

Wherefore say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Are ye polluted <S%H2930><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>? and commit ye whoredom <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their abominations <S%H8251><s%>?

For when ye offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, when ye make your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, ye pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with all your idols <S%H1544><s%>, even unto this day <S%H3117><s%>: and shall I be enquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, I will not be enquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you.

And that which cometh <S%H5927><s%> into your mind <S%H7307><s%> shall not be at all, that ye say <S%H559><s%>, We will be <S%H1961><s%> as the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, as the families <S%H4940><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%>, to serve <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>.

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, surely with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured out <S%H8210><s%>, will I rule <S%H4427><s%> over you:

And I will bring you out <S%H3318><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein ye are scattered <S%H6327><s%>, with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured out <S%H8210><s%>.
And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and there will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>.

Like as I pleaded <S%H8199><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, so will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
And I will cause you to pass <S%H5674><s%> under the rod <S%H7626><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>: bond: or, delivering

And I will purge out <S%H1305><s%> from among you the rebels <S%H4775><s%>, and them that transgress <S%H6586><s%> against me: I will bring them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the country <S%H776><s%> where they sojourn <S%H4033><s%>, and they shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

As for you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Go <S%H3212><s%> ye, serve <S%H5647><s%> ye every one <S%H376><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%>, and hereafter <S%H310><s%> also, if ye will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me: but pollute <S%H2490><s%> ye my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> no more with your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, and with your idols <S%H1544><s%>.

For in mine holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, there shall all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, all of them in the land <S%H776><s%>, serve <S%H5647><s%> me: there will I accept <S%H7521><s%> them, and there will I require <S%H1875><s%> your offerings <S%H8641><s%>, and the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of your oblations <S%H4864><s%>, with all your holy things <S%H6944><s%>. firstfruits: or, chief

I will accept <S%H7521><s%> you with your sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, when I bring you out <S%H3318><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein ye have been scattered <S%H6327><s%>; and I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>. sweet: Heb. savour of rest

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, into the country <S%H776><s%> for the which I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And there shall ye remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and all your doings <S%H5949><s%>, wherein ye have been defiled <S%H2930><s%>; and ye shall lothe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for all your evils <S%H7451><s%> that ye have committed <S%H6213><s%>.

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I have wrought <S%H6213><s%> with you for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, not according to your wicked <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, nor according to your corrupt <S%H7843><s%> doings <S%H5949><s%>, O ye house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H8486><s%>, and drop <S%H5197><s%> thy word toward the south <S%H1864><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%> to the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in thee, and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> every green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in thee, and every dry <S%H3002><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>: the flaming <S%H3852><s%> flame <S%H7957><s%> shall not be quenched <S%H3518><s%>, and all faces <S%H6440><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> shall be burned <S%H6866><s%> therein.
And all flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have kindled <S%H1197><s%> it: it shall not be quenched <S%H3518><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>! they say <S%H559><s%> of me, Doth he not speak <S%H4911><s%> parables <S%H4912><s%>?
